stimulusHtml: A research team lesioned the lateral hypothalamus of a rat and then monitored the ratâ€™s activity when it recovered from the surgery. Their hypothesis is likely to be that the rat would do which of the following?
choicesHtml:
Experience impaired short-term memory in learning a maze

Form extreme fear responses to nonthreatening stimuli

Show reduced eating behavior

Display increased sociability toward other rats
